Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Schematic \Sche*mat"ic\, a. [Cf. Gr. ? pretended.] Of or pertaining to a scheme or a schema. [1913 Webster]
schematic adj : represented in simplified or symbolic form [syn: {conventional}, {formal}] n : diagram of an electrical or mechanical system [syn: {schematic drawing}]
